headers.subject: [tosdr:959] [Bad] *Right to leave the service* on kippt.com: nothing about this topic on the privacy policy

subject: [Bad] *Right to leave the service* on kippt.com: nothing about this topic on the privacy policy
text:
Hello,

Delicious being *bad* rated, I looked for an alternative service to move in: Kippt. Here are the ToS:
https://kippt.com/privacy/

Before singing in I made a Ctrl+F (or Option+F) on the terms «delete», and «close», and «cancel», nothing found. So I read. I found nothing on this topic on their page.

I had to sign in (giving my email address) then log in, then I went to Settings>Account Settings>Cancel my account to read:
"You're about to delete your account. Please remember that once you delete your account you will loose your data (it's kind of serious business right there).
You can always export your clips before deleting your account."
OK, but IMHO that's not legal terms.

I think that is a bad practice.

Regards,

V

-- 
www.tos-dr.info // www.twitter.com/tosdr // www.github.com/Unhosted/ToS-DR
---
